title: The steal
body:
The Steal 
Hey guys this is the story of Bad teemos. The bad teemo the cunning teemo the Damn teemo!!! . sad day i didnt know in the beginning ..... 
Im " Yi " {{champion:11}}  the blades man. they call me this cause i do amazing stuf with my blade lol that's not the actual reason though 
let me come to the point. Me as usual was going for jungling kills golds funs etc all day then later on me and my team 
ah..... yasuo {{champion:157}}  the wind guy i like his blade <3 <3 <3 dont tell him XD. then vayne  {{champion:67}}  she is "my crush " dont tell her that too.
sona  {{champion:37}}  pretty but deadly also the though guy malphite {{champion:54}}  going to get the baron. yeah... that big purple creature the which 
looks lick cassopiea and teemo mix(lol not like teemo but i hate him so i compare him with such ugly things ). oops sorry.
Im getting distarceted with teemo stuffs!!!  comingggg to the pointt

yeah we were attacking the baroooooon. The wind guy {{champion:157}}  doing that wind wall thing so no damage for us. God he has good damage.
Malph {{champion:54}} i dunno what he was doing i guess he was giving us moral support by hiding in the bush that enemy team as ward {{item:3363}}  already !!
yeeeep !!!!!!.sona playing the situation music wait wait its Vayne. she is pretty good hottie good etc good. oh again 
im getting distracted once again !!!! cominggg to the pointtt

mmmmm every thing was going on well till that thing happen. that beep beep beep. oh u dunno what beep is.
Beep is equal to the word. hup sorry words which we say to the enemy who kills us when we are about to get the penta kill with
one more basic attack. yeah yeah yeah that that is the guy and those are the words what you are thinking now.
getting distracted again !!!! coming to the point !!!!   
that beep beep son teemo has been hiding near the baron. all saying  " What the beeeeeeeeeep??? ".
me saying oh teemo please beep me !!!!! Never mind if he is hiding i dont care  let let 
let him hide but why the beep? he stole the baron. just like always this beep thing started flowing through my mouth.
one side saying my mind baron baron baron baron also other side  son of beep! son of a beep! son of a beep!. 
At the same time teemo he flashed {{summoner:4}}  and ran away. once again my mind son of a beep !!! . mean while malph is still hiding.
let him hide!!! Me saying sona change the music its time to do the ammu thing me and all started crying except malph 
cause he  is hiding dude he is doing the guerrilla attack the best strategy. Never mind they stole the baron 
i dont care but why on earth teemo ?????? stole. beep beep beep. What steal seriously didnt expect that !!!! 
still still endless beeps to him. thats how he stole it!!!! so of beep. one day i will to steal you baron teemo 
keep that in mind. i started continuing my jungling and watching Vayne. i should buy her something that why i participated
in this FanFiction thought im a champion not a fan. riot will accept that please please give me 1st price so 
i can buy vayne the  Arclight dress and take her for the dinner. And i will too buy a suit  So guys i need some RP.
"I can live without RP 
but not without Vayne {{champion:67}}  XD <3 <3 <3"
you help me or  I  R.I.P.............

replies.body: I think if you formatted this piece as a diary, it might be easier to follow.
